name: Chegg - $10,000 STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: $10,000 scholarship for high school seniors pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate academic excellence in STEM courses, participate in STEM extracurriculars, and submit essay on STEM career goals.
stem_fields: All STEM Fields

name: Chegg - Women in Engineering Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for female high school students planning to major in engineering. Must demonstrate interest in engineering through coursework, projects, or extracurricular activities. Essay required on impact of women in engineering.
stem_fields: Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Civil Engineering

name: Chegg - Computer Science Future Leaders Scholarship
description: $7,500 scholarship for high school students interested in computer science and software development. Must have completed at least one programming course or demonstrate coding skills through projects. Two awards available.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Programming, Software Development, IT

name: Chegg - Minority in STEM Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for Black, Hispanic/Latino, or Native American high school students pursuing STEM majors. Must demonstrate financial need and commitment to increasing diversity in STEM fields. GPA 3.0+ required.
stem_fields: All STEM Fields

name: Chegg - Environmental Science Scholar Award
description: $4,000 scholarship for high school students passionate about environmental science and sustainability. Must submit proposal for environmental project or research. Open to students in grades 10-12.
stem_fields: Environmental Science, Ecology, Sustainability, Biology

name: Chegg - Mathematics Achievement Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for high school students with exceptional mathematics skills. Must have GPA 3.5+ in math courses and participate in math competitions or clubs. Essay on importance of mathematics in STEM.
stem_fields: Mathematics, Statistics, Applied Mathematics

name: Chegg - Robotics and Automation Scholarship
description: $6,000 scholarship for students involved in robotics teams or automation projects. Must describe robotics experience and future goals in engineering or computer science. Preference for FIRST Robotics participants.
stem_fields: Robotics, Engineering, Computer Science, Automation

name: Chegg - First Generation STEM Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship specifically for first-generation college students pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate financial need and academic achievement. Essay required on challenges and aspirations as first-gen student.
stem_fields: All STEM Fields

name: Chegg - Chemistry Innovation Scholarship
description: $4,500 scholarship for high school students interested in chemistry and chemical engineering. Must have completed chemistry coursework and demonstrate interest through projects or research. Three awards available.
stem_fields: Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Biochemistry

name: Chegg - Cybersecurity Future Professionals Scholarship
description: $8,000 scholarship for students interested in cybersecurity and information security. Must demonstrate interest through coursework, certifications, or competitions. Essay on importance of cybersecurity in modern world.
stem_fields: Cybersecurity, Computer Science, Information Technology, Network Security

name: Chegg - Biomedical Sciences Scholarship
description: $5,500 scholarship for high school students planning to pursue biomedical sciences, pre-med, or health-related STEM fields. Must have strong science GPA and demonstrate commitment to healthcare.
stem_fields: Biomedical Science, Biology, Pre-Medicine, Health Sciences

name: Chegg - Data Science and Analytics Scholarship
description: $6,500 scholarship for students interested in data science, statistics, and analytics. Must demonstrate skills in data analysis, visualization, or programming. Portfolio or project examples encouraged.

name: Chegg - Renewable Energy Scholarship
